attributes.action: VISA FREE travel for Ukrainian refugees to the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The UK needs to help these innocent people be saved from the war in Ukraine. They need our help. Woman and children are being allowed to leave Ukraine and have no where to go. They left without any personal items and no money and need the worlds help right now. There husbands, fathers, grandmasters, uncles, friends had to stay and fight. Please help these refugees find safety.
attributes.background: Please accept Ukrainian refugees without a visa. Help them come to the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
